languages.text: "Предлагаю проявить милость. Мы доказали свою силу, они больше не осмелятся бунтовать".
"I would suggest a show of mercy. We have demonstrated our power. They will not dare rebel again."
languages.original_text: "Предлагаю проявить милость. Мы доказали свою силу, они больше не осмелятся бунтовать".

traits.locale_text: "I would suggest a show of mercy. We have demonstrated our power. They will not dare rebel again."
"I would suggest a show of mercy. We have demonstrated our power. They will not dare rebel again."
"I would suggest a show of mercy. We have demonstrated our power. They will not dare rebel again."
"I would suggest a show of mercy. We have demonstrated our power. They will not dare rebel again."
"I would suggest a show of mercy. We have demonstrated our power. They will not dare rebel again."
"I would suggest a show of mercy. We have demonstrated our power. They will not dare rebel again."

languages.text: “我建议我们慈悲为怀。我们已经让他们看到了我们的力量，他们绝对不敢再造反了。”
languages.original_text: "I would suggest a show of mercy. We have demonstrated our power. They will not dare rebel again."

traits.locale_text: “我建议我们慈悲为怀。我们已经让他们看到了我们的力量，他们绝对不敢再造反了。”

languages.text: 「慈悲を示してみてはどうだろうか。我々は力を見せつけた。もう、反逆する者はいないだろう」
languages.original_text: "I would suggest a show of mercy. We have demonstrated our power. They will not dare rebel again."

traits.locale_text: 「慈悲を示してみてはどうだろうか。我々は力を見せつけた。もう、反逆する者はいないだろう」

languages.text: «Yo sugeriría una muestra de misericordia. Hemos demostrado nuestro poder. No se atreverán a rebelarse de nuevo».
languages.original_text: "I would suggest a show of mercy. We have demonstrated our power. They will not dare rebel again."

traits.locale_text: «Yo sugeriría una muestra de misericordia. Hemos demostrado nuestro poder. No se atreverán a rebelarse de nuevo».

languages.text: "Ich würde zur demonstrativen Gnade raten. Wir haben unsere Macht schon bewiesen. Sie werden es nicht wagen, erneut zu rebellieren."
languages.original_text: "I would suggest a show of mercy. We have demonstrated our power. They will not dare rebel again."

traits.locale_text: "Ich würde zur demonstrativen Gnade raten. Wir haben unsere Macht schon bewiesen. Sie werden es nicht wagen, erneut zu rebellieren."

languages.text: « Je suggère de faire preuve de miséricorde. Notre démonstration de force suffira à les dissuader de se rebeller à nouveau. »
languages.original_text: "I would suggest a show of mercy. We have demonstrated our power. They will not dare rebel again."

traits.locale_text: « Je suggère de faire preuve de miséricorde. Notre démonstration de force suffira à les dissuader de se rebeller à nouveau. »

languages.text: "Merhamet göstermeni tavsiye ederim. Gücümüzü gösterdik. Yeniden isyan etmeye cüret edemezler."
languages.original_text: "I would suggest a show of mercy. We have demonstrated our power. They will not dare rebel again."

traits.locale_text: "Merhamet sergilemeni tavsiye ederim. Gücümüzü gösterdik. Yeniden isyan etmeye cüret edemezler."
